channel.title: any help with enabling AI?
channel.description: For Some Reason When i starta new game / load a game there is this thing that says to the left of my crosshair AI disa then cuts off half way through the a i can only assume that that means the ai is disabled as everyone is still and enemys dont respond Here Is My launch options in steam -sw -noborder "autolaunch: +mat_dxlevel 110 +mat_hdr_level 2 +mat_hdr_enable +mat_fullbright 0 as i have problems with fulbright randomly turning on in any source game started shortly after i died in the front area of we got hostiles between the turret and the giant red fire door i turned on sv_cheats 1 so i could spawn in a shotgun instead of a magnum It only happens if i die in we got hostiles for some reason as well i have reoved the vent mod and waited 30 mins and retryed still happens tried it with blast pit and it hasn't happened for some resaon

item.title: any help with enabling AI?
item.dc:creator: ChasingPanther
item.description:
The same problem occured this evening, now it constantly says AI dis…
If only someon could help us!

Read full topic

item.title: any help with enabling AI?
item.dc:creator: ghostboy1225
item.description:
For Some Reason When i starta new game / load a game there is this thing that says to the left of my crosshair AI disa then cuts off half way through the a i can only assume that that means the ai is disabled as everyone is still and enemys dont respond
Here Is My launch options in steam -sw -noborder "autolaunch: +mat_dxlevel 110 +mat_hdr_level 2 +mat_hdr_enable +mat_fullbright 0 as i have problems with fulbright randomly turning on in any source game started shortly after i died in the front area of we got hostiles between the turret and the giant red fire door i turned on sv_cheats 1 so i could spawn in a shotgun instead of a magnum
It only happens if i die in we got hostiles for some reason as well i have reoved the vent mod and waited 30 mins and retryed still happens tried it with blast pit and it hasn’t happened for some resaon

Read full topic
